name: div
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
150 Cloth : Made from 100% polyester circular knit for durability & a pro-level finish
2-Way Stretch : Flexible fabric moves with you for enhanced mobility & comfort
Moisture Management : Keeps you dry and cool by wicking sweat away from the body
Stain Release : Helps resist & release tough dirt & grass stains with ease
Gripper Elastic Waistband : Secures your jersey in place for a clean, tucked-in look
Flat-Lock Stitching : Reduces irritation while delivering reinforced durability
Pocket Tie-Downs : Keeps pocket contents stable & secured during gameplay
Zipper Fly & Set-In Back Pockets : Adds professional style with everyday functionality
Fit : Premium knee-high fit with finished elastic hem for a classic on-field look
